title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Friday, 20 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: a 36-year-old man has been arrested by police under anti-terrorism laws .
the takeover of northampton town by kelvin thomas is `` hanging by a thread '' .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live is finished for today , but we 'll be back on monday from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : freezing tonight with chance of snow tomorrow
text: weather : freezing tonight with chance of snow tomorrow
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: northampton cinema hosts lectures for university
text: undergraduates on the film and screen studies degree course at the university of northampton are holding seminars and screenings at the errol flynn filmhouse in northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire 's weather is more local than you would think
text: join the nation 's favourite conversation and share what the weather is like where you live .
find out more about becoming a bbc weather watcher
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: northamptonshire councils have millions in reserve
text: the government said councils should be spending some of their reserves rather than cutting services .
but councils argue it is important to plan for unforeseen costs
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: gritters to go out across northamptonshire as road temperatures plummet
text: gritting lorries will be out on main roads tonight after forecasts of wintry showers and low temperatures .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: pair jailed for 16-year-old 's death in a14 van crash
text: two men from northampton have been jailed after a teenage girl died when the van they were in crashed through hedges and landed on the a14 near rothwell .
emmanuel price allowed william wallace , to drive and encouraged him to go faster .
alysha bell , 16 , was a passenger in the van and suffered fatal injuries .
price was jailed for six years and two months , and wallace for three years and two months .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : former swindon chairman linked to cobblers councils have millions in reserve
text: if you are catching up
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: son 's frustration after driving test cancelled due to strike action in kettering
text: a learner driver due to take his test today was left frustrated after turning up to be told the examiners were on strike .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: iran adventurer 's close encounter with wolves
text: along with his travelling companion leon mccarron , tom allen , from middleton near corby , took part in a six week expedition through iran .
the pair have made a film about their trip .
he said his adventure was `` fantastic , '' but there was one scary moment

documents.title: construction industry has tradespeople , but lacks professionals
text: homes , offices , schools and factories may not get built over the next ten years if a shortage of construction professionals is not addressed , according to the northamptonshire enterprise partnership .

documents.title: house-building in corby on the increase , says council
text: corby is performing better at building houses than last year , according to figures from theborough council .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: saints ' glasgow clash sees them reunited with former star
text: saints ' glasgow clash sees them reunited with former star

documents.title: weather warning for northamptonshire
text: stay up-to-date with bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: bridge between islip and thrapston may re-open much sooner than planned
text: a bridge that was due to remain closed until a week before christmas - prompting fears among local businesses that they would be put out of business - is set to re-open next week .
the bridge between thrapston and islip will open following a meeting between thrapston residents , business , and the county council .

documents.title: northamptonshire man makes film about iran adventrue
text: tom allen , from middleton near corby , along with his travelling companion leon mccarron , completed a six week expedition through iran .
they turned their adventure into a film .
here 's part of the trailer

documents.title: headlines : mccrory cobblers interest rumoured northampton town staff hardship fund
text: here 's what we are looking at :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: supporters ' trust founder brian lomax will 'never walk alone '
text: congregation sing you 'll never walk alone
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: enterprise partnership says northamptonshire need construction professionals
text: a shortage of construction professionals - people like site managers and surveyors - is causing big problems for building companies in the county , according to research by the northamptonshire enterprise partnership .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: shadow home secretary pays tribute to supporters ' trust founder
text: andy burham mp is among those at the funeral in barby of brian lomax , the founder of the northampton town supporters ' trust .
mr lomax , who died aged 67 , then went on to help found supporters ' direct - the umbrella organisation representing other trusts run by fans .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: myler returns to saints starting xv to face glasgow
text: northampton saints have announced their line-up for their european champions cup trip to glasgow warriors tomorrow .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton town : former swindon town chairman jed mccrory rumoured to be persuing cobblers deal
text: radio northampton understands former swindon town chairman jed mccrory is in talks with david cardoza about a potential buy-out of the club .
yesterday evening kelvin thomas issued a statementclaiming talks are `` hanging by a thread '' .
we have tried to contact both mr mccrory and mr cardoza without any success as yet , but will update this feed as when we hear anything more .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: seven new primary schools needed in the daventry area by 2025
text: seven new primary schools and a new secondary school need to be built in the daventry area in the next decade to cope with the rising population in the town , the county council has revealed .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: funeral of brian lomax , founder of northampton town supporters ' trust
text: coffin arrives at brian lomax 's funeral - andy burnham mp a pallbearer

documents.title: councils sitting on millions of pounds worth of reserves
text: a bbc investigation has found councils across the east of england are sitting on reserves of £ 470m .
in northamptonshire , the total estimated unallocated reserve for 2015-16 is £ 40.2m .
author: Deborah McGurran
BBC Political editor, East of England

documents.title: kettering borough council funds local community initiatives to the tune of £ 63,000
text: kettering borough council has recently awarded grants totalling £ 63,000 forimportant local projects in the boroughas part of its community fund and capital hall grant schemes .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: northampton town staff say ongoing takeover saga a 'nightmare '
text: staff at northampton town have released a statement regarding the club 's ongoing financial issues .
in it , they said : `` as things drag on , each day gets more and more difficult both professionally and personally . ''

documents.title: 'no immediate threat ' after oundle pharmacy terrorism search
text: west yorkshire police , who have searched an oundle pharmacy as part of a terrorism investigation , have told the bbc it was intelligence led and not in response to any immediate threat or risk '' .
a 36-year-old leicester man was arrested at birmingham airport on 2 november under section 5 of the terrorism act .
he has been released on bail pending further enquiries .
a property in leicester was also searched .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: oundle pharmacy searched by anti-terror cops
text: a 36-year-old man has been arrested by police using anti-terrorism laws .
as part of their investigation a pharmacy in oundle has been searched .
police say the man , from leicester , was arrested at birmingham airport on 2 november under section 5 of the terrorism act .
he has been bailed pending further enquiries .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: 'uncertainty ' over midland mainline electrification , mps warn
text: mps have raised serious concerns about rail investment in the uk following a series of delays to large-scale projects including the midland mainline .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: northampton town : chairman needs to 'make his mind up '
text: northampton town : chairman needs to 'make his mind up '

documents.title: northampton town : chairman cardoza says he 's 'doing the best for the club '
text: the current chairman of northampton town , david cardoza , has spoken about kelvin thomas ' potential deal to buy the club , which mr thomas has said is `` hanging by a thread '' .

documents.title: northampton borough council leader 'disappointed ' at prevaricating cardoza
text: northampton borough council leader 'disappointed ' at prevaricating cardoza

documents.title: northampton town : kelvin thomas hoped deal 'would have been done ages ago '
text: former oxford united chairman kelvin thomas spoke to bbc radio northampton about the deal to buy northampton town which he said is `` hanging by a thread '' .

text: what 's happening at northampton town ?
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

text: largely dry morning but scattered showers this afternoon and top temperature of 8c ( 46f ) .
you can see my full forecast below

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll bring you all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .
plus , we 'll tell you about any developments at northampton town football club .
if you have something you want to share with us then you can email us , tweet us or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
